ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.checkEmailDescription: If an account exists, we've sent you instructions to reset your password.

hero.title: Website Scraping
hero.subtitle: Extract structured data from any website with our advanced AI-powered scraping tool. Perfect for market research, lead generation, and content monitoring.

structuredData.title: Structured Data
structuredData.description: Extract data in JSON, CSV, or any format you need

simpleApi.title: Simple API
simpleApi.description: Integrate with your apps through our REST API

anyWebsite.title: Any Website
anyWebsite.description: Works with dynamic JS sites and complex structures

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to extract structured data from any website with ease

dataExtraction.title: Smart Data Extraction
dataExtraction.description: Our AI-powered system identifies and extracts structured data from any website, even from dynamic JavaScript-rendered content.

exportFormats.title: Multiple Export Formats
exportFormats.description: Export your scraped data in JSON, CSV, Excel, or directly to your database through our API.

developerApi.title: Developer Friendly API
developerApi.description: Integrate with your applications using our well-documented REST API with examples in multiple programming languages.

cloudProcessing.title: Cloud Processing
cloudProcessing.description: All processing happens in our cloud, meaning you don't need to worry about proxies, IP blocking, or server resources.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor your scraping jobs in real-time with detailed statistics and logs.

scheduling.title: Scheduled Scraping
scheduling.description: Set up recurring scraping jobs to automatically gather fresh data at your preferred intervals.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

enterprise.description: Need a custom plan for your enterprise? Contact us for tailored solutions.
